description: Describes the agreement that's identified by the AgreementId.

parameters.name: AgreementId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the agreement. This identifier is returned when you create an agreement.

parameters.name: ServerId
parameters.description: The server identifier that's associated with the agreement.

nested_items.name: Agreement
nested_items.description: The details for the specified agreement, returned as a DescribedAgreement object.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the agreement.

nested_items.name: AgreementId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the agreement. This identifier is returned when you create an agreement.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The name or short description that's used to identify the agreement.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the agreement, either ACTIVE or INACTIVE.

nested_items.name: ServerId
nested_items.description: A system-assigned unique identifier for a server instance. This identifier indicates the specific server that the agreement uses.

nested_items.name: LocalProfileId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the AS2 local profile.

nested_items.name: PartnerProfileId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the partner profile used in the agreement.

nested_items.name: BaseDirectory
nested_items.description: The landing directory (folder) for files that are transferred by using the AS2 protocol.

nested_items.name: AccessRole
nested_items.description: Connectors are used to send files using either the AS2 or SFTP protocol. For the access role, provide the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Identity and Access Management role to use.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Key-value pairs that can be used to group and search for agreements.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The name assigned to the tag that you create.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Contains one or more values that you assigned to the key name you create.

nested_items.name: PreserveFilename
nested_items.description: Determines whether or not Transfer Family appends a unique string of characters to the end of the AS2 message payload filename when saving it.
ENABLED: the filename provided by your trading parter is preserved when the file is saved.
: when Transfer Family saves the file, the filename is adjusted, as described in File names and locations.

nested_items.name: EnforceMessageSigning
nested_items.description: Determines whether or not unsigned messages from your trading partners will be accepted.
ENABLED: Transfer Family rejects unsigned messages from your trading partner.
: Transfer Family accepts unsigned messages from your trading partner.

nested_items.name: CustomDirectories
nested_items.description: A CustomDirectoriesType structure. This structure specifies custom directories for storing various AS2 message files. You can specify directories for the following types of files.
Failed files.
MDN files.
Payload files.
Status files.
Temporary files.
